subject_geometry.description: Young Asian woman with a cute, soft, round face shape and pale, porcelain skin. Her skin texture is natural and dewy with a soft glow.
subject_geometry.face_detail: Distinctive large, dark, round eyes with prominent 'aegyo-sal' (charming under-eye fullness), looking up sideways at the camera with a mischievous, innocent doe-eyed gaze. Her mouth is posed in a specific tight-lipped, suppressed smile (lips pressed together firmly in a thin line), creating a shy, playful, and quirky expression.
subject_geometry.proportions: elongated legs, model proportions, 1:9 head-to-body ratio, cinched tiny waist, hourglass silhouette
subject_geometry.pose: standing straight, legs crossed at ankles (right over left), distinct thigh gap, phone obscuring face

clothing_stack.outerwear: Double-breasted peplum coat in muted taupe-greige. Structure: stiff tailoring, flared hip hem (skirt-like). Details: Six prominent gold shank buttons. Trim: Voluminous, fluffy brownish-grey faux fur collar and matching massive fur cuffs covering the wrists.
clothing_stack.bottoms: Micro-mini black shorts, barely visible, creating 'zettai ryouiki' (gap of bare skin between boots and hem).
clothing_stack.footwear: Over-the-knee suede boots in pale concrete grey. Fit: skin-tight, sock-boot style, pointed toe, high heel, smoothing the leg shape.

environment_details.location: Uniqlo or fast-fashion retail store interior
environment_details.background_clutter: Racks of down puffer jackets, hanging garments in muted earth tones (olive, beige, black).
environment_details.lighting: Overhead cool-white retail strip lighting, diffused by phone camera filter.
environment_details.reflections: Vertical mirror frame visible on left edge, polished tile floor reflecting the boots.

final_text_prompt: A hyper-realistic mirror selfie of a female fashion influencer with exaggerated model proportions (long legs, tiny waist). She is wearing a structured, double-breasted peplum coat in muted greige wool with massive, fluffy grey fur cuffs and a fur collar. Gold buttons gleam on the coat. She wears pale grey, skin-tight suede thigh-high boots with a pointed toe, revealing a section of bare upper thigh against tiny black shorts. The face is completely hidden by a white iPhone. Background is a blurred clothing store aisle with racks of puffer jackets and a shopper in the distance. Lighting is cool, soft, and diffused with a desaturated, high-fashion social media filter applied.
